forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 13C. WSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High near 55F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
